AIXPertEntry.name: prereqbinaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for binaudit: Checks for available disk space to enable audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqAIX72GE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for AIX72: Checks whether AIX version is greater than or equal to 7.2.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqcde
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for CDE: Checks whether CDE entry exists in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlft
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for LFT: Checks whether LFT is configured.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqTE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for Trusted Execution: Checks whether the system has the Trusted Execution feature on.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqlh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for loginherald: Checks whether herald value is set or not.

AIXPertEntry.name: prereqnontcb
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: Prereq rule for non-TCB: Checks whether the system is non-TCB.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sysintegrity
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Rcatequirement 5: Protect All Systems and Networks from Malicious Software 5.1: Maintaining the system integrity by detecting, removing and protecting against known types of malicious software

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_brokenlinks
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.1: Remove Unused Symbolic Links.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_clicrte
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.2: Install clic.rte for EFS configuration.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_umask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.3: Ensure default umask is 027 or more restrictive.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_find_groupwritables
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.4: Remove group write permission from default groups - exceptions must be in TSD and audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_find_stickybit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.5: Application Data with requirement for world writable directories.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_find_worldwritables
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.6: Ensure there are no world writable files - exceptions must be in TSD and audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_find_staffwritables
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.7: Ensure there are no 'staff' writable files - exceptions must be in TSD and audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_find_ownerless
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.8: Ensure all files and directories are owned by a user (uid) and assigned to a group (gid).

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_writesrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.9: Comment the entry for writesrc in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_blocktalksrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.10: Block attempts to use the talk and write command.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_blockwritesrv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.11: Block attempts to use the talk and write command.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_dt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.12: Comment the entry for dt in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_piobe
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.13: Comment the entry for piobe in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_qdaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.14: Comment the entry for piobe in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rcnfs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.15: Comment the entry for rcnfs in /etc/inittab.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_uninstallcasagent
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.16: Uninstall cas_agent.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_inetd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.17: Disable inetd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_aixmibd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.18: Disable aixmibd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_dhcpcd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.19: Disable dhcpcd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.20: Disable dhcprd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.21: Disable dhcpsd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.22: Disable dpid2 daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_gated
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.23: Disable gated daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.24: Disable hostmibd daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.25: Disable mrouted daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.26: Disable named daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.27: Disable portmap daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.29: Disable rwhod daemon and comment its entry in /etc/rc/tcpip.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_uninstallNFSclient

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_uninstallNFSserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.38: NFS - de-install NFS server.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_disableNFSsuid

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.70: Comment the entry for sprayd service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.71: Comment the entry for xmquery service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.72: Comment the entry for talk service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.73: Comment the entry for telnet service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.74: Comment the entry for tftp service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.75: Comment the entry for time service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_udptime
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.76: Comment the entry for time service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_uucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.77: Comment the entry for uucp service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_clean_partial_conns
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.1: Set the value of the network option clean_partial_conns to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_bcastping
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.2: Set the value of the network option bcastping to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_directedbcast
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.3: Set the value of the network option directed_broadcast to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_icmpaddrmask
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.4: Set the value of the network option icmpaddressmask to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ipforwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.5: Set the value of the network option ipforwarding to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ipignoredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.6: Set the value of the network option ipignoredirects 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ipsendredirects
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.7: Set the value of the network option ipsendredirects 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ipsrcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.8: Set the value of the network option ipsrcrouteforward 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ipsrcrouterecv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.9: Set the value of the network option ipsrcrouterecv 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ipsrcroutesend
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.10: Set the value of the network option ipsrcroutesend 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ip6srcrouteforward
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.11: Set the value of the network option ip6srcrouteforward 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_nfsusereservedports
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.12: Set the value of the network option nfs_use_reserved_ports 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_nonlocsrcroute
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.13: Set the value of the network option nonlocsrcroute 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sockthresh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.14: Set the value of the network option sockthresh 60.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_tcppmtudiscover
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.15: Set the value of the network option tcp_pmty_discover 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_tcpsecure
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.16: Set the value of the network option tcp_tcpsecure to 7.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_udppmtudiscover
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.17: Set the value of the network option tcp_pmty_discover 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ip6forwarding
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.18: Set the value of the network option ip6forwarding 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.19: Ensure that IP Security is available.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ipsecloopbk
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.20: Ensure loopback is blocked on external interfaces.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ipsecfilter
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 1: Install and Maintain Network Security Controls 1.21: Ensure filters are active.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_uninstallNISclient
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.78: Make sure the NIS client is disabled and uninstalled if it is not used in the environment.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_uninstallNISserver
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.79: Make sure the NIS server is disabled and uninstalled if it is not used in the environment.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_snmpgroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.80: Remove the + (plus) markers from /etc/group file.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_snmppasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.81: Remove the + (plus) markers from /etc/passwd file.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_nissubnet
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.82: Limit access to the NIS data to specific subnets if NIS must be used in the environment.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermrcp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.83: Remove all permissions from the remote service command rcp.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.84: Remove all permissions from the remote service command rlogin.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermrsh
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.85: Remove all permissions from the remote service command rsh.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rmetchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.86: Disable or comment out entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rmrhostsnetrc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.87: Remove .rhosts and .netrc files for all users.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermrlogind
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.88: Remove all permissions from the remote service daemon rlogind.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermrshd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.89: Remove all permissions from the remote service daemon rshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermtftpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.90: Remove all permissions from the remote service daemon tftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_uninstallCDE
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.91: De-install CDE.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_cmsd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.92: Comment the entry for cmsd service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_cde_disable_dtlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.93: CDE - disabling dtlogin.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_dtspc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.94: Comment the entry for dtspc service in /etc/inetd.conf and refresh inetd process.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermdtaction
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.95: Remove setuid/setgid bit from /usr/dt/bin/dtaction.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermdtappgather
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.96: Remove setuid/setgid bit from /usr/dt/bin/dtappgather.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermdtprintinfo
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.97: Remove setuid/setgid bit from /usr/dt/bin/dtprintinfo.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermdtsession
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.98: Remove setuid/setgid bit from /usr/dt/bin/dtsession.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_cde_requestport
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.99: CDE - remote GUI login disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_cde_savertimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.100: CDE - screensaver lock.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_cde_locktimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.101: CDE - screensaver lock.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_cde_labelstring
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.102: CDE - login screen hostname masking.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: copy /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources add Dtlogin*greeting.labelString "Authorized uses only. All activity may be monitored and reported."

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_cde_perslabelstring
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.103: CDE - login screen hostname masking.
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: copy /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources add Dtlogin*greeting.persLabelString "Authorized uses only. All activity may be monitored and reported."

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermxconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.104: Set the ownership root

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownxconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.105: Set the read-only group and other permissions for /etc/dt/config/Xconfig.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermxservers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.106: Set the ownership root

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownxservers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.107: Set the read-only group and other permissions for /etc/dt/config/Xservers.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermxresources
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.108: Set permissions for /etc/dt/config/*/Xresources.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownxresources
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.109: Set the ownership root

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chetcftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.110: Disable root access to ftpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ftpbanner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.111: Set an ftp login banner which displays the acceptable usage policy.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_ftpd_noworldaccess
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.112: FTPD - prevent world access and group write to files.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshversionv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.113: Minimum version is 8.1.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rmetchostsequiv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.114: Disable or comment out entries from /etc/hosts.equiv file.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_shosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.115: Remove any existing .shosts files from all user home directories.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_allowdeny_groups
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.1: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_permitrootlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.2: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_banner
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.3: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_hostbasedauthentication
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.4: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_ignore_rhosts
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.5: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_permit_empty_passwords
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.6: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_log_level
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.7: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_sftp_server_args
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.8: sshd_config
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertArgs: MULTIPLE Subsystem "sftp /usr/sbin/sftp-server -u 027 -f AUTH -l INFO" "sftp /usr/sbin/sftp-server -u 027 -f AUTH -l DEBUG" /etc/ssh/sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_max_auth_tries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.9: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_permit_user_environment
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.10: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_use_conditional_exceptions
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.11: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_kex_algorithms
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.12: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_ciphers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.13: sshd_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_macs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.14: ssh_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sshd_rekey_limit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.15: ssh_config

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sendmail_sgm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.116: Hide sendmail version information.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sendmail_po
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.117: Ensure that PrivacyOptions includes at least authwarnings, noexpn, and novrfy.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sendmail_dpo
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.118: Ensure that sendmail in MTA mode supports only local applications that require legacy MTA.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownsendmailcf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.119: Set the ownership root for /etc/mail/sendmail.cf.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermsendmailcf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.120: Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for /etc/mail/sendmail.cf.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownclientmqueue
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.121: Set the ownership smmsp for /var/spool/clientmqueue.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermclientmqueue
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.122: Set the permissions ug=rwx,o= for /var/spool/clientmqueue.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownmqueue
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.123: Set the ownership root for /var/spool/mqueue.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermmqueue
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.124: Set the permissions u=rwx,go= for /var/spool/mqueue.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chsnmp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.125: Disable the private community string in /etc/snmpd.conf, disable the system community string in /etc/snmpd.conf, restrict community access in /etc/snmpd.conf.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_uninstallsnmp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.126: Uninstall snmp and snmpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_uninstallsendmail
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.127: Uninstall sendmail.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_logintimeout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.16: Specifies the time interval (30 seconds) to type in a password.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_logindelay
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.17: Specifies the delay between unsuccessful logins to 10 seconds.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_loginherald
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.128: Adds a default herald to /etc/security/login.cfg.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_loginretries
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.129: Specifies the number of consecutive unsuccessful login attempts to 5, for each non-root user account before the account is disabled.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_homedirs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.130: Home directory must exist and Home directory must be owned by account, or special account.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermhome
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.131: Set the permissions g-w,o-w for all user home directories.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.1: Set the ownership root

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.2: Set the permissions u=rwx,g=rs,o= for /audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermauditdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.3: Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for all /audit/* objects and the children objects recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_securitydirsperms
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.132: SECURITY Subsystems

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermvaradmrasdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.133: Set the permissions o-rw for /var/adm/ras/*.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownadmsa
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.134: Set the ownership adm

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermadmsa
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.135: Set the permissions u=rwx,go=rx for /var/adm/sa.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermcrontabsdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.136: Set the group cron for all /var/spool/cron/crontabs directory tree objects.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chowncrontabs
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.137: Set the permissions o= for the children objects of /var/spool/cron/crontabs recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermpath
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.138: Set the permissions g-w,o-w for all the directories in root user PATH environment variable.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_roothomedir
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.139: Ensure root user has a dedicated home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownsecurityaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.4: Set the ownership root

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermsecurityaudit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.5: Set the permissions u=rwx,g=rx,o= for/etc/security/audit.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermsecurityauditdirtree
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.6: Set the permissions u=rw,g=r,o= for all /etc/security/audit/* objects and the children objects recursively.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermsubmitcf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.140: New configuration file for sendmail /etc/mail/submit.cf.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_find_setuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.141: Verify Trust of suid, sgid, acl, and trusted-bit files and programs.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rootcrnjobck
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.142: Make sure the permissions of all the root crontab entries are owned and writable by the root user only.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermhomeconf
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.143: Set the permissions g-w,o-w for all user configuration files in each home directory.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermsmitlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.144: Set the permissions o-rw for /smit.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chowngroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.145: Set the ownership root

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermgroup
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.146: Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/group.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chperminetd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.147: Set the ownership root

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chowninetd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.148: Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/inetd.conf.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownmotd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.149: Set the ownership bin

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermmotd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.150: Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/motd.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownpasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.151: Set the ownership root

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermpasswd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.152: Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/passwd.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermsshconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.153: Set the permissions u=rw,go=r for /etc/ssh/ssh_config.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermsshdconfig
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.154: Set the permissions u=rw,go= for /etc/ssh/sshd_config.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chownatallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.155: Set the ownership root

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermatallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.156: Set the permissions u=r,go= for /var/adm/cron/at.allow.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chowncronallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.157: Set the ownership root

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermcronallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.158: Set the permissions u=r,go= for /var/adm/cron/cron.allow.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermRMstartlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.7: Set the permissions o-rw for /var/ct/RMstart.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermcronlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.8: Set the permissions o-rw for /var/adm/cron/log.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermdpid2log
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.9: Set the permissions o-rw for /var/tmp/dpid2.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermhostmibdlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.10: Set the permissions o-rw for /var/tmp/hostmibd.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chpermsnmpdlog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.11: Set the permissions o-rw for /var/tmp/snmpd.log.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rootsu
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.18: Restrict access to root, via su, to members of a specific group by disabling console login for root.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rootlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.19: Restrict access to root, via su, to members of a specific group by disabling remote login for root.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rootrlogin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.20: Restrict access to root, via su, to members of a specific group by setting sugroups attribute to SUADMIN.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rootsugroups
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.21: Restrict access to root, via su, to members of a specific group by setting su attribute to true.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_corelimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.159: Core Dumps

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_corehardlimit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.160: Core Dumps

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_disfullcore
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.161: Core Dumps

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rmdotfrmpathetcenv
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.162: Removes the dot from the PATH variable in /etc/environment file.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_lockdaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.163: Lock historical user daemon.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_lockbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.164: Lock historical user bin.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_locksys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.165: Lock historical user sys.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_lockadm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.166: Lock historical user adm.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_lockuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.167: Lock historical user uucp.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_locknobody
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.168: Lock historical user nobody.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_locklpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.169: Lock historical user lpd.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_locklp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.170: Lock historical user lp.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_lockinvscout
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.171: Lock historical user invscout.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_lockipsec
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.172: Lock historical user ipsec.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_locknuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.173: Lock historical user nuucp.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_locksshd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.174: Lock historical user sshd.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rmdotfrmpathroot
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.175: Remove current working directory from root's PATH.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_chketcmotd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.176: Create a /etc/motd file which displays, post initial logon, a statutory warning message.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_histexpire
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.22: Specifies the number of weeks before a password can be reused to 52.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_histsize
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.23: Specifies the number of previous passwords a user cannot reuse to 0.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_minage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.24: Specifies the minimum number of weeks to 1 week, before a password can be changed.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_hashedpasswords
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.25: All accounts must have a hashed password.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_checkuid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.26: Ensure all users have a unique UID and name on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_checkgid
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.27: Ensure all groups have a unique GID and name on the system.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_policy4all
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.28: Ensure password policy is enforced for all users.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_pwdalgorithm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.29: Set the system password algorithm to a stronger cryptographic hash algorithm.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_nocrypt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.30: Ensure passwords are not hashed using 'crypt'.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_minlen
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.31: Specifies the minimum length of a password to 14 characters.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_mindiff
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.32: Specifies the minimum number of characters that were present in the previous password that cannot be used in the new password to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_minalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.33: Specifies the minimum number of alphabetic characters in a password to 3.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_minother
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.34: Specifies the minimum number of non-alphabetic characters in a password to 3.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_maxrepeats
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.35: Specifies the maximum number of times a character can appear in a password to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_mindigit
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.36: Specifies the minimum number of digits in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_minloweralpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.37: Specifies the minimum number of lowercase alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_minupperalpha
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.38: Specifies the minimum number of uppercase alphabetic characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_minspecialchar
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.39: Specifies the minimum number of special characters in a password to 1.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_loginadm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.177: Set local login (login) for user adm to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rloginadm
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.178: Set remote login (rlogin) for user adm to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_loginbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.179: Set local login (login) for user bin to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rloginbin
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.180: Set remote login (rlogin) for user bin to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_logindaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.181: Set local login (login) for user daemon to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rlogindaemon
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.182: Set remote login (rlogin) for user daemon to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_loginguest
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.183: Set local login (login) for user guest to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rloginguest
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.184: Set remote login (rlogin) for user guest to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_loginlpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.185: Set local login (login) for user lpd to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rloginlpd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.186: Set remote login (rlogin) for user lpd to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_loginnobody
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.187: Set local login (login) for user nobody to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rloginnobody
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.188: Set remote login (rlogin) for user nobody to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_loginnuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.189: Set local login (login) for user nuucp to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rloginnuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.190: Set remote login (rlogin) for user nuucp to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_loginsys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.191: Set local login (login) for user sys to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rloginsys
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.192: Set remote login (rlogin) for user sys to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_loginuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.193: Set local login (login) for user uucp to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_rloginuucp
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.194: Set remote login (rlogin) for user uucp to false.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_uidftpusers
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.195: Add all users with a UID less than 200 to /etc/ftpusers file.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_maxage
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.40: Specifies the maximum number of weeks (13 weeks) that a password is valid.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_maxexpired
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 8: Identify Users and Authenticate Access to System Components 8.41: Specifies the maximum time (in weeks) beyond the maxage value that a user can change an expired password to 4.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sudo
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.196: Privilege escalation sudo.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sudolog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.12: Ensure sudo logging is active.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_sudopty
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.197: Ensure Sudo commands use pty.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_limitcissysacc
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.198: Review the current at/cron files and add any relevant users to the /var/adm/cron/at.allow and /var/adm/cron/cron.allow files.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_atallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.199: Ensure only root is included in at.allow file.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_cronallow
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.200: Ensure only root is included in cron.allow file.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_flrt
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 2: Apply Secure Configurations to All System Components 2.201: Install flrtvc tool.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_justified_remote_syslog
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.13: AIX must only use remote syslog servers justified and documented using site-defined procedures.

AIXPertEntry.name: pciv4_disable_syslogd
AIXPertEntry.AIXPertDescription: PCIV4 Requirement 10: Log and Monitor All Access to System Components and Cardholder Data 10.14: Disallow the local syslogd daemon from accepting messages from other hosts on the network.
